  ✖ Pair the onClick mouse event with the onKeyUp, the onKeyDown, or the onKeyPress keyboard
    event.

    <div onClick={() => {}} />
    ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

  ℹ Actions triggered using mouse events should have corresponding keyboard events to account for
